TopicTitle: My Game Has a Fatal Error on the RP-1 Mod

Articles.Content:
Hey Guys I just downloaded the RP-1 Mod for KSP and one of it's Dependencies called Kerbalism has a fatal Error that is stopping me from doing anything or closing my game unless I use Task Manager to force Close it. Can someone please help me fix this as I would like to play KSP with this mod.

file:///C:/Users/Tyler/Downloads/Fatal Error KSP.jpg

Hi there,

You can't post links to files on your hard drive because other people can't access your PC to look at them (if they could, you'd have a much bigger problem!). You need to put them on a file sharing site and then post links here: use something like Imgur for images and Dropbox for log files.

On that note, you'll also need to post your log files as they contain a lot more information than the error you see on the screen.

Did you install RP-1 using the CKAN RP-1 express install option? It's the easiest way to install RP-1 and all its dependencies and is a lot less work than finding all the required mods yourself.

On 5/1/2022 at 4:41 AM, jimmymcgoochie said:

Did you install RP-1 using the CKAN RP-1 express install option? It's the easiest way to install RP-1 and all its dependencies and is a lot less work than finding all the required mods yourself.

Yes I did, but I did find the problem one of its dependences was outdated on 1.8 so I had to update it to 1.10.1 . Thank you
